data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 29783, Version Hash: bf9f33cbe3dd55a651b11804acc743638c80da25
data.actual_result: Discord's main window becomes offset by a varying amount of pixels, sometimes so much that it appears off screen.
data.expected_result: Discord's main window should reappear at the position it was when it was closed.
data.short_description: Discord can launch itself off screen in certain text-scaling configurations
data.steps_to_repro: - Have at least 2 monitors. - Go to display settings and set the text scale to be a different value for at least 1 monitor, preferably one on the left. - Move Discord so that it to the right of the monitor with a different text scale, and note its position. - Exit Discord from the tray and re-launch it. - Observe Discord's position on your screen.
